pageProduct.name: Sukin Purely Ageless Pro Firming Eye Cream 15ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Restore vitality to the delicate skin around the eyes. Enriched with Bakuchiol, a natural alternative to Retinol, and Hyaluronic Acid, this high-performance eye cream will help reduce the appearance of crow’s feet and fine lines around the eyes.  Boosted with Red Algae Extract to visibly reduce puffiness.

Warnings

This product contains natural active ingredients. Patch testing and gradual introduction is recommended. If irritation occurs reduce frequency or discontinue use & seek medical advice. For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. 

Common Uses

98% of users saw a visible improvement in the appearance and condition of their skin. *using total Purely Ageless PRO range

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Hydroxypropyl Starch Phosphate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Coco-Caprylate, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Polyglyceryl-4 Oleate, Glycerin, Bakuchiol, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Rhodophyceae Extract (Red Algae), Davidsonia Jerseyana Fruit Extract (Davidson Plum), Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Ceteareth-20, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Citric Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate.  

Directions

APPLICATION: Use the tip of the tube to gently apply half a pea-sized amount to each eye area, gliding from under eye toward outer corner. Gently pat around eye area with the tip of your finger.
